clean_data: Network Administrator span lNetworkspan span lAdministratorspan Network Administrator US An enthusiastic network engineer with the necessary drive and determination needed to resolve complex networking issues Possessing effective organisational skills and excellent working knowledge of networking technologies and having a commitment to keep up to date with the latest developments Experienced in providing motivation guidance and an up to date networking consultancy service to both colleagues and clients Now looking for a new and challenging network engineer position one which will make best use of my existing skills and experience and also further my development Work Experience Network Administrator Silicon India in Bangalore Bangalore Karnataka January 2012 to January 2014 Company Profile SiliconIndia is 15year old media firm Over the last one decade SiliconIndiacom has emerged as the most trusted source for news and information for professionals The portal has a global ranking of No5 in the IT News Media category With over 4 million registered users SiliconIndiacom is the fastest growing portal and is ranked among the top 200 websites most trafficked from India Duties Responsibilities Administering designing LANs WANs internetintranet and voice networks Analysing developing key components using methodology prescribed techniques Communicating and negotiating with users specialists other staff and suppliers Network connectivity troubleshooting ping tracert telnet Responsible for communication protocols configuration integration security Investigating diagnosing and resolve all network problems Maintaining prepackaged software applications on the LAN Upgrading and repairing faults on CIS systems networks peripheral equipment Cisco switch configuration in particular VLAN configuration and troubleshooting Education Bachelor of Engineering BE in Information Science Sri Revana Siddeshwara Institute of Technology Bangalore Karnataka 2005 to 2011 Cisco Certified Networking Associate CCNA in Networking ICSE India Skills Team leader with Excellent Communication Skills Good understanding of static routing and SQL databases Having a good technical networking background Working knowledge of major networking components hardware components Ability to explain technical issues clearly to non technical colleagues Experience of performance measurement capacity and tuning issues Thorough understanding of Windows UNIX or NT Extensive knowledge of Microsoft based operating systems including Windows Server 2008 Windows Vista and Windows 7 Also excellent software skills including knowledge on MSOffice MSWord MSExcel MS PowerPoint Windows 7XP Linux C C C HTML JAVA Script SQL RDBMS
